title: Twitter User Airs Saudi Arabia's Dirty Laundry
teaser: A Twitter user in Saudi Arabia has been exposing the lavish lifestyles of royals, bad military deals and other offenses in the kingdom. NPR's Arun Rath speaks with Ozy.com writer Laura Secorun Palet about her coverage of the leaks.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
